name: Deco Deck
description:
Deco Deck is a new logic puzzle from the creator of Semantle and Surfwords. Your goal is to link the cards on the board in connected groups of five, such that each group makes a valid "hand". Hands are: straights, flushes, full houses, five of a kind, and rainbows. To win, every card on the board must be part of a hand. Each puzzle has only one solution.



Deco Deck includes four puzzles every day, and 48 additional puzzles every month. You can access the complete archives of all past daily and monthly puzzles.

A colorblind accessibility mode is available.
